local_intent: Detect and approach the red_plate, align, lower until contact, place the held white_plate at place_pose, release and retreat.
assumptions: white_plate is already secured in the gripper
place_pose key exists on the blackboard (set earlier in the GLOBAL_BT)
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer-phase actions from perception of the red plate through final placement and release, matching the GLOBAL_BT step sequence and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION intent.
